page.title: 14Farming, Shenington/Alkerton
page.content: Rough Hill Farm's fields are made up of permanent pasture for dairy herd and silage lays. Hornton Grounds, Alkerton barn and Manor Farm have the same owner. It is a mixed farm with winter barley, permanent pasture, forage crops and silage lays. Alkerton barn has a dairy herd and a permanent pasture for sheep for fattening. It also has stubble turnips and forage crops. Manor Farm, Balscote is the same as Hornton Grounds but it has no dairy herd. Epwell Grounds is owned by Jim Hedges. It is a mixed farm with winter barley, winter wheat, permanent pasture and silage lays. Shutford Grounds is a dairy farm with winter wheat, winter barley, permanent pasture, forage crops and silage lays. Mill Farm has the same as Rough Hill Farm.
